item.description:
Monty Python's Life of Brian

1979R94 minutes

Born on the original Christmas Day in the stable next door to Jesus, Brian (Graham Chapman) grows up to join an anti-Roman separatist group. But as he tries to escape trouble with the law, he finds himself reluctantly thrust into the role of the Messiah. Monty Python legends John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle and Michael Palin co-star in this classic religious satire that pokes fun at fanaticism and hypocrisy.


Cast:Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle, Terry Jones, Michael PalinDirector:Terry JonesGenres:Comedy, Spoofs and Satire, Cult Comedies, Best of British Humor, United Kingdom, Blu-ray, Foreign RegionsThis movie is:Controversial, Goofy, QuirkyFormat:DVD and Blu-ray

 

ENNEAGRAM AT THE MOVIES
Vegetarian dinner provided from 7 to 8pm. Fine to show up anytime. It's helpful for me to know in advance if you are coming, particularly if you are eating, though if fine just to show up if you can't decide beforehand. You are welcome to bring additional items if you want. Movie starts at 8pm and generally ends approximately at 10:30pm. We stop the movie on occasion to talk about Enneagram types, subtypes and relationship dynamics. The cost is $20-25 sliding scale. Please feel free to bring friends and I can help them learn the types if they don't know the Enneagram.

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram expert, having taught over 2000 Enneagram personality types workshops, as well as the Myers-Briggs and Astrology. He is an author of 2 books, a psychotherapist for individuals, couples and families and leads Personality Types Trainings for groups, organizations, churches, schools, colleges and yoga centers.

herb@herbpearce.com

781 648 3737

www.herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Personality Types in the Movies - Monty Python's The Life of Brian
